abstract: Children’s Aid Society, one of eight organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Gertrudis Torres pay for her daughter's fifth grade graduation dues.

headline.print_headline: Positive Outlook in the Face of Cancer and Grief
headline.main: Despite Cancer Diagnosis and Husband’s Death, Keeping a Positive Outlook

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Gertrudis Torres said her son and daughter have given her motivation to beat the disease, even as her substantial grief and her weakened physical strength made the challenge seem impossible at times....
lead_paragraph: Gertrudis Torres said her son and daughter have given her motivation to beat the disease, even as her substantial grief and her weakened physical strength made the challenge seem impossible at times.
